message: Hi anyone willing to be a beta tester for my startup: www.foodsplore.com? If you are please email me on zsuleman@whitestonecompliance.co.uk for login details...
sure, count me in, my email is martin@wawrusch.com
@Foodsplore What is Foodsplore?  Can we know before we sign up?

Sure Foodsplore is a location-based social network that helps you and your friends discover great food or places to eat wherever you are in the world..whilst at the same time enhancing your real world social life. Well, that's our aim anyway!
If I can add, it has some really interesting features we all are going to like. Curious? Apply for beta tester and see what they are...
@ambarathooni can you send me your email address?
Thanks guys, I'll send out details within the next couple of days as Amazon is giving us a bit of trouble today!
We are looking for beta testers too at www.streamerapp.com
hey guys Would love beta invites to any and all. can also send you invites to our app mirapost.com omar@mirapost.com
Note to all - rather than straight up asking for invites, maybe include a short summary of what you want us to test (we're all too lazy to visit websites and read =p)
